item.title: Is There a Link Between Asthma and Rheumatoid Arthritis?
item.description: Questions remain on whether there are links between patients with asthma and RA, including heterogeneity of disease. Medscape Medical News

item.description: How doctors wrestle with sacred moments in a secular field when the science isn’t enough. Medscape Medical News
